meanings.definition: Neatly or trimly smart in dress or appearance.
meanings.sent1: He always looks natty in his crisp white shirt.
meanings.sent2: The gentleman wore a natty suit to the party.
meanings.sent3: The natty cat groomed itself meticulously, looking like a little dapper feline.
meanings.sent4: Her natty outfit was like a colorful painting in a sea of dull colors.
meanings.sent5: The natty peacock strutted proudly, showing off its vibrant feathers.

meanings.sent1: She bought a natty hat that perfectly matched her dress.
meanings.sent2: The new boutique in town sells natty clothing for young adults.
meanings.sent3: The natty sunglasses made him look like a movie star on vacation.
meanings.sent4: Her natty sense of style turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The natty watch on his wrist was the envy of his friends.

meanings.sent1: The magician's natty tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: She had a natty way of solving puzzles quickly.
meanings.sent3: The natty squirrel outsmarted the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent4: His natty negotiation skills always got him the best deals.
meanings.sent5: The natty chef effortlessly created a delicious masterpiece in the kitchen.
